TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed FileIOPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class FileIOPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class FileIOPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此權限區分檔案 IO 存取提供下列四種:This permission distinguishes between the following four types of file IO access provided by : - `Read`： 可讀取的檔案或檔案，例如它的長度或上次修改時間的相關資訊的存取權的內容。`Read`: Read access to the contents of the file or access to information about the file, such as its length or last modification time. - `Write`： 變更檔案，例如其名稱的相關資訊之存取權的檔案內容的寫入存取權。`Write`: Write access to the contents of the file or access to change information about the file, such as its name. 也可以刪除和覆寫。Also allows for deletion and overwriting. - `Append`： 可寫入至檔案結尾。`Append`: Ability to write to the end of a file only. 無法讀取。No ability to read. - `PathDiscovery`： 存取本身的路徑中的資訊。`PathDiscovery`: Access to the information in the path itself. 這有助於保護機密資訊的路徑，例如使用者名稱與路徑中所顯示的目錄結構的相關資訊。This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure that is revealed in the path. 這個值不能存取由路徑表示的檔案或資料夾。This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path. > [!NOTE] > 提供存取組件是類似於授與完全信任。Giving access to an assembly is similar to granting it full trust. 如果應用程式不應該寫入至檔案系統，它不應該有存取。If an application should not write to the file system, it should not have access. 所有這些權限是獨立的這表示其中一個權限不代表另一個權限。All these permissions are independent, meaning that rights to one do not imply rights to another. 例如，`Write`權限不代表權限`Read`或`Append`。For example, `Write` permission does not imply permission to `Read` or `Append`. 如果想要使用多個權限，也可以結合使用位元 OR，下列程式碼範例所示。If more than one permission is desired, they can be combined using a bitwise OR as shown in the code example that follows. 檔案使用權限的定義是根據標準的絕對路徑。呼叫應該一律會產生標準的檔案路徑。File permission is defined in terms of canonical absolute paths; calls should always be made with canonical file paths. 描述檔案和資料夾上的受保護的作業。 describes protected operations on files and folders. 類別可協助提供檔案和資料夾的安全存取。The class helps provide secure access to files and folders. 建立檔案控制代碼時，將執行安全性的存取檢查。The security access check is performed when the handle to the file is created. 藉由在建立時的檢查，安全性檢查的效能影響降至最低。By doing the check at creation time, the performance impact of the security check is minimized. 開啟檔案就會發生一次，而讀取和寫入可能會發生多次。Opening a file happens once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times. 一旦開啟檔案時，不再需要執行檢查。Once the file is opened, no further checks are done. 如果物件傳遞至不受信任的呼叫端時，可能會誤用。If the object is passed to an untrusted caller, it can be misused. 例如，檔案控制代碼應該不會儲存在公用的全域靜態程式碼與較低權限可以存取。For example, file handles should not be stored in public global statics where code with less permission can access them. 指定可以在檔案或資料夾上執行的動作。 specifies actions that can be performed on the file or folder. 此外，這些動作可以結合以形成複雜的執行個體使用位元 OR 運算。In addition, these actions can be combined using a bitwise OR to form complex instances. 資料夾的存取權表示其中的內容，並且可存取所有檔案和資料夾及其子資料夾中的所有檔案的存取權。Access to a folder implies access to all the files it contains, as well as access to all the files and folders in its subfolders. 例如，`Read`存取 C:\folder1\ 意指`Read`存取 C:\folder1\file1.txt，C:\folder1\folder2\\，C:\folder1\folder2\file2.txt，依此類推。For example, `Read` access to C:\folder1\ implies `Read` access to C:\folder1\file1.txt, C:\folder1\folder2\\, C:\folder1\folder2\file2.txt, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET Framework 的版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，您可以使用方法，以防止不當存取系統資源所信任的程式碼。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 現在已過時，和資源的存取權現在僅取決於授與的權限集合組件。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制存取檔案，您必須在沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼，並指派給它的權限程式碼可以存取的資源。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 如需在沙箱中執行應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 執行部分信任程式碼在沙箱中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). ## Examples 下列範例說明使用的程式碼。The following examples illustrate code that uses . 在下列兩行程式碼，該物件之後`f`代表電腦的本機磁碟讀取用戶端上的所有檔案的權限。After the following two lines of code, the object `f` represents permission to read all files on the client computer's local disks. 程式碼範例，然後要求來判斷應用程式是否有讀取檔案的權限的權限。The code example then demands the permission to determine whether the application has permission to read the files. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 在下列兩行程式碼，該物件之後`f2`代表讀取 C:\test_r 與讀取和寫入至 C:\example\out.txt 的權限。After the following two lines of code, the object `f2` represents permissions to read C:\test_r and read and write to C:\example\out.txt. `Read` 和`Write`代表如先前所述的檔案/資料夾權限。`Read` and `Write` represent the file/folder permissions as previously described. 建立權限之後, 程式碼會要求以判斷應用程式是否具有讀取和寫入檔案的權限的權限。After creating the permission, the code demands the permission to determine whether the application has the right to read and write to the file. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用對指定檔案或目錄的指定存取權限以及對檔案控制項資訊的指定存取權限，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the designated file or directory and the specified access rights to file control information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓一個指定所指定的檔案或目錄的值。This constructor allows only one value to be specified for the specified file or directories. 使用方法來定義複雜的權限。Use the method to define complex permissions. `control`參數會指定是否的存取控制清單 (ACL) 的檔案或目錄所指定`path`可以變更，檢視，或無法存取。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the file or directory specified by `path` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性上採取特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties. 能夠變更或檢視 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會取得或設定在本機電腦與網路磁碟機上的所有檔案的允許的存取。This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives. 個別值可以檢查使用的位元 AND 運算。An individual value can be checked for using a bitwise AND operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example shows the use of the property. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#3)]

.property instance valuetype System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles
Public Property AllLocalFiles As FileIOPermissionAccess

public: property System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess AllLocalFiles { System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::FileIOPermissionAccess value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定允許的所有本機檔案存取。

span.span: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.

value.span: 所有本機檔案的檔案 I/O 旗標集合。

span.span: The set of file I/O flags for all local files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本機檔案是包含在本機電腦上的檔案。Local files are files contained on the local computer. 透過網路磁碟機不存取任何檔案是本機檔案。Any files not accessed through a network drive are local files. 個別值可以檢查使用的位元 AND 運算。An individual value can be checked for using a bitwise AND operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example shows the use of the property. [!code-cpp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileIOPermission Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileIOPermission Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製的權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

summary.span: 取得 物件的雜湊碼，其適合用於雜湊表這類的雜湊演算法和資料結構。

span.span: Gets a hash code for the object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.

returns.span: 目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的權限的兩個執行個體的雜湊程式碼可能會不同，因此雜湊程式碼不應比較兩個物件。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects.

param.name: access
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示單一檔案存取類型。

span.span: One of the values that represents a single type of file access.

summary.span: 使用指定的 取得所有的檔案和目錄。

span.span: Gets all files and directories with the specified .

returns.span: 一個陣列，包含可以由 參數所授與之權限存取的檔案及目錄路徑。

span.span: An array containing the paths of the files and directories to which access specified by the parameter is granted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來取得目前的權限狀態。Use this method to get the state of the current permission. 若要取得兩者的狀態`Read`和`Write`存取，兩個呼叫這個方法所需。To get the state of both `Read` and `Write` access, two calls to this method are required. > [!NOTE] > `access`參數僅限於值，代表單一類型的檔案存取。The `access` parameter is limited to the values of , which represent single types of file access. 這些值是， ， ，和。Those values are , , , and . 可接受的值`access`不包含和，這不代表單一類型的檔案存取。The values acceptable to `access` do not include and , which do not represent single types of file access. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/CPP/fileiopermission.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/CS/fileiopermission.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission/VB/fileiopermission.vb#7)]

span.span: is not a valid value of .
-or-

span.span: is , which represents more than one type of file access, or , which does not represent any type of file access.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Intersect (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission
public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Intersect(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的權限是指定權限的子集，如果目前權限會指定一組作業所包含的指定權限。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的讀取存取權限是到 c： 代表讀取存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents read access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents read access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed
Public Function IsUnrestricted () As Boolean
public: virtual bool IsUnrestricted();

summary.span: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.

summary.span: 設定指定檔案和目錄的指定存取權，取代使用權限的現有狀態。

span.span: Sets the specified access to the specified files and directories, replacing the existing state of the permission.

public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Union(System::Security::IPermission ^ other);

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是權限，表示代表的所有作業目前的權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
